title: Injustice 3, God of War PC, & More Leaked by Nvidia?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.15.21
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about a HUGE leak from Nvidia GeForce Now, Bluetooth coming to Nintendo Switch, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:13:08 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now and it’s a jam packed episode. You’re getting:
A Solar Ash preview from, A large breakdown of all of our unanswered questions from the PlayStation Showcase, Twisted Metal Talk,New PlayStation Studio talk, Deathloop talk, AND MORE. That’s available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Also a reminder: It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:14:40 - Nvidia confirms leaked Geforce Now list is real, but claims games are ‘speculative’ - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:29:50 - A WND Update: Nintendo finally adds Bluetooth audio to the Switch in a new software update - Mitchell Clark, Jay Peters, and Sean Hollister @ The Verge
00:30:40 - - Best Friends Q:Dean LaBarca
00:33:35 - Ad 
00:35:39 - Next year’s Call of Duty game is Modern Warfare 2 - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:43:40 - Battlefield 2042 could get delayed - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:50:00 - Pulse 3D Wireless Headset in Midnight Black launches next month - PS Blog
00:55:45 - Anthony Mackie To Star As John Doe In Live-Action ‘Twisted Metal’ - Justin Kroll @ Deadline
01:01:10 - Out today
01:03:15 - Squad Up:Stove(PS5) - BirdCultured
01:03:54 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tamoor and Tim
